**The Ritual of the Golden Seal for Exorcism and Supplication**

**Title:** *Ritual of the Golden Seal for Exorcism and Supplication* (Jīn guān shè jiào yí).
**One scroll.**

**Original Source:** *Zhèngtǒng Dàozàng* (Canon of the Orthodox Daoist Treasury), *Dòngxuán bù* (Mysterious Primordial Section), *Wēiyí lèi* (Category of Auspicious Rites).

**Ritual Procedure as Prescribed:**
The officiating Daoist priest (lǐshī) shall perform each rite in accordance with the prescribed form, and shall recite the sacred incantations (shén zhòu) as directed.

**Invocation of the Five Celestial Stars:**
May the Five Celestial Stars array themselves in splendor (lìè zhào, *illuminate*), their brilliance manifesting in all directions (huàn míng wǔfāng).
The Water Star repels calamity (shuǐxīng què zāi),
The Wood Star brings prosperity through virtue (mùdé zhì chāng).
The Upholstering Star (Yínghuò, *Mars*) dispels misfortune (xiāo huò),
The Great White Star (Tàibái, *Venus*) wards off military threats (bì bīng).
The Zhen Star (Zhènxīng, *Mercury*) steadfastly secures blessings (jiāguó lì héng).

**Sacred Seal and Scriptures:**
Its name is inscribed upon jade tablets (míng jiān yùjiǎn),
Its characters are recorded in the Imperial Archives (zì lù dìfáng).
Ascending on the gusting winds (chéng biāo sàn jǐng),
It soars through the boundless expanse (fēi téng tàikōng).
Moving unseen through the netherworld (chūrù míngwú),
It traverses and banquets in all ten directions (yóuyǎn shífāng).

**Summoning the Five Cloud Spirits:**
The Five Clouds (wǔyún) float as a canopy (fú gài),
To invoke the divine (zhāo shén shè fēng),
And command all spirits (yìshǐ wànlíng).
The celestial sentinels (shàng wèi xiānwēng) shall guard above.

**Harmony with the Dao and the True:**
In accordance with the Dao and the True Essence (hé yǔ Dào hé zhēn).

**Striking the Law Drum:**
The Law Drum (fǎgǔ) shall be struck twenty-four times (míng fǎgǔ èrshísì tōng).

**Summoning the Celestial Hierarchy:**
The Most High Three Heavens (Wúshàng sān tiān), the Primordial Beginning (Xuányuán), the Three *Qi* (Sānjīng), and the Most Venerable Lord Lao (Tàishàng Lǎojūn) are invoked.
From their midst, the **Thirty-Six Celestial Functionaries** (Sānshíliù gōngcáo) of the Five Phases (Zhōng sānwǔ),
The **Thirty-Six Left and Right Officials** (zuǒyòu guānshǐzhě),
The **Thirty-Six Dragon-Cavalry Messengers** (zuǒyòu pěngxiāng yìlóng qí lì),
The **Thirty-Six Attendants of Incense** (sìxiāng jīntóng),
The **Thirty-Six Heavenly Heralds** (chuányán yùnǚ),
The **Thirty-Six Imperial Seal-Bearers** (Zhífú Zhíri),
And the **Thirty-Six Celestial Incense Officials** (Zhíri Xiāngguān),
All **Thirty-Six in number** (gè sānshíliù rén chū), shall emerge.

**The Emerging Spirits:**
They shall be arrayed in solemn attire (chūzhě, yán zhuāng).

**Opening the Celestial and Terrestrial Portals:**
The gates of the Mysterious Primordial Hall (Xuán tán) and the Earthly Deities (Tǔdì) shall be unlocked,
And the territorial spirits (Fāngyù shénzhēn) shall be summoned.

Your humble servant, in this quiet night,
Conducts the **Great Offering (jiào)** and morning rites,
With reverent devotion and sincere sincerity,
And all the sacred texts and incantations duly prepared.

May the **Supreme Dao’s Most Authentic Essence-Qi (Zhìzhēn Dàodé qì)**—the **Spiritual Treasure-Light (Língbǎo guāng)**—descend and flow into our bodies,
So that our earnest petitions may swiftly reach the **Supreme, Boundless Dao of Ultimate Reality (Wújí Dàdào)**,
Before the **Three Pure Ones (Sānqīng)**—the **Most Exalted Celestial Sovereign (Hàotiān Zhìzūn Jīnyuè Yùhuáng Dìshàngdì)**.

We humbly invoke the **Lawful Rank (Fǎwèi)** and our full names—[Subject’s Name] and the assembled officials at the altar—
And together, with utmost sincerity, address:

The **Primordial Heavenly Worthies (Yuánshǐ Tiānzūn)** of the **Jade Pure Realm (Yùqīng Shèngjìng)**,
The **Soul-Treasured Heavenly Worthies (Língbǎo Tiānzūn)** of the **High Pure Realm (Shàngqīng Zhēnjìng)**,
The **Dao-Virtue Heavenly Worthies (Dédào Tiānzūn)** of the **Supreme Pure Realm (Tàiqīng Xiānjìng)**,
The **Most Exalted Celestial Sovereign (Hàotiān Zhìzūn Yùhuáng Dìshàngdì)**,
The **Heavenly Sovereign of the Gōuchén Star-Court (Gōuchén Xīnggōng Tiānhuáng Dàdì)**,
The **Grand Sovereign of the Northern Celestial Pole (Běijí Zǐwēi Dàdì)**,
The **Earthly Sovereign (Hòutǔ Huángdì Zhī)** who follows Heaven’s Law,
The **Grand Sovereign of the Eastern Azure Splendor (Dōngjí Qīnghuá Dàdì)**,
The **Grand Sovereign of the Southern Eternal Life (Nánjí Chángshēng Dàdì)**,
The **Heavenly Worthies of the Void (Xūwú Zhūtiān Tiānzūn)**,
The **Heavenly Sovereigns of the Void (Xūwú Zhūtiān Dìshàngdì)**,
The **Nine Celestial Sovereigns of the Divine Mansion (Shénxiāo Jiǔchén Dìshàngdì)**,
The **Nine Heavenly Sovereigns of the Born Gods (Jiǔtiān Shēngshén Dìshàngdì)**,
The **Five Directions’ Five Elderly Sovereigns (Wǔfāng Wǔlǎo Dìshàngdì)**,
The **Five Blessings and Ten Divine Sovereigns of the Great Unity (Wǔfú Shíshén Tàiyǐ Zhēnjūn)**,
The **Mid-Heaven Sovereign of the Northern Dipper (Běidǒu Zhōng Gāoshàng Yùhuáng Zūn Dì)**,
The **Grand Sovereign of the Northern Celestial Exalted (Běijí Xuánqīng Dàdì)**,
The **Imperial Sovereign of the Sun-Court (Rìgōng Tàiyáng Dìjūn)**,
The **Royal Sovereign of the Moon-Palace (Yuèfǔ Tàiyīn Huángjūn)**,
The **Five Directions’ Five Virtue-Star Sovereigns (Wǔfāng Wǔdé Xīngjūn)**,
The **Four Luminaries of the Mysterious Metropolis (Xuándū Sìyào Xīngjūn)**,
The **Six Ministers of the Southern Dipper (Nándǒu Liùsī Xīngjūn)**,
The **Nine Sovereigns of the Northern Dipper (Běidǒu Jiǔhuáng Xīngjūn)**,
The **Three Dipper Sovereigns of East, West, and Center (Dōngxī Zhōng Sāndǒu Xīngjūn)**,
The **Five Dipper Central Divine Sovereigns and All Celestial Spirits (Wǔdǒu Zhōngshén Xiānlíng Guān)**,
The **Grand Saint of the Heavenly Ganges (Tiāngǎng Dàsèng Kuíguāng Dìjūn)**,
The **Three Platforms and Canopy-Star Sovereigns (Sāntái Huágài Xīngjūn)**,
The **Twenty-Eight Constellation-Star Sovereigns (Èrshíbā Xiù Fēn Xīngjūn)**,
The **Twelve Zodiacal Mansion-Star Sovereigns (Shíèr Gōng Fēn Xīngjūn)**,
The **Sixty Heavenly Stems-and-Branches-Star Sovereigns (Liùshí Jiǎzǐ Xīngjūn)**,
The **Imperial Sovereign of the Sovereign’s Native Star (Huángdì Běnmìng Xīngjūn)**,
The **Imperial Heir’s Native Star Sovereign (Huángtàizǐ Běnmìng Xīngjūn)**,
The **True Ruler of the Celestial Sovereign’s Illuminating Seat (Dìzuò Zhàolín Zhēnzǎi)**,
The **True Sovereign of the Heavenly Hosts’ Degrees (Zhōutiān Xiùdù Xīngzhēn)**,
The **Three Sovereigns of the Three Elements (Sānyuán Sānguān Dàdì)**,
The **True Celestial Worthies of the Three Elemental Registries (Sānyuán Cáofǔ Zhēnxiān)**,
The **Four Celestial Worthies of the Northern Celestial Pole (Běijí Sìshèng Zhēnjūn Yuèxià Zhēnzǎi)**,
The **Jade Pure Soul-Treasured Ancestral Teachers of All Generations (Lìdài Shī Zhēnzǔshī)**,
The **Supreme Celestial Saints of the Three Heavens (Sāntiān Dàsèngshī Zhèngyī Zhēnjūn)**,
The **Three Worthies of the Supreme Unity (Zhèngyī Sānshī Zhēnjūn)**,
The **Two True Worthies of the Wang and Zhao (Zuǒyòu Wáng Zhào Èr Zhēnrén)**,
The **Thirty-Sixth Generation Celestial Master (Sānshíliùdài Tiānshī Xūjìng Zhēnjūn)**,
The **Supreme Unity’s Generational Transmission Teachers (Lìdài Chuánjiào Shī Zhēn)**,
The **True Celestial Saints of the Three Caverns and Four Auxiliaries (Sāndòng Sìfú Jīnglù Zhōngzhēn Xiānshèngshèng)**,
The **Nine Heavenly Inspectors (Jiǔtiān Cǎifǎng Shī Zhēnjūn)**,
The **Supreme Celestial Worthies of the Heavenly Registries (Tiān Cáofǔ Tàihuáng Wànfú Zhēnjūn)**,
The **True Rulers of the Nine Heavenly Registries (Jiǔtiān Tiān Cáofǔ Lièbān Zhēnzǎi)**,
The **Twelve Celestial Worthies of Master Xǔ of the Western Mountains (Xīshān Xǔ Hào Shíèr Wèi Zhēnjūn)**,
The **True Worthies of the Supreme Primordial Sage (Tàijí Xiānwēng Zhēnjūn)**,
The **Three Celestial Worthies of the Canopy (Huágài Sānxiān Zhēnjūn)**,
The **Three Worthies of the Mao Peaks and the Sovereign of Destiny (Sānmáo Sīmìng Zhēnjūn)**,
The **High Law-Rulers of All Divine Offices (Zhūsī Yuànfǔ Zhǔ Fǎgāo Zhēn)**,
The **True Rulers of the Upper Realm’s Assembly of Worthies (Shàngjiè Cháoyuán Zhēnzǎi Léitíng Fǎbù Guānjūn)**,
The **Lawful Officials and Soldiers Subordinate to the Law-Pacifying Bureau (Fǎjìng Suǒshǐ Guānjiàng Bīng)**,
The **Five Sacred Sovereigns of the Five Mountains and Five Heavens (Wǔyuè Wǔtiān Shèngdì Yuèfǔ Wēilíng)**,
The **Water-Court Sovereigns of the Supporting-Sun Tree and the Watery Realm’s Celestial Worthies (Shuǐfǔ Fúsāng Dàdì Shuǐxiāng Xiānzhòng)**,
The **True Responsive Spirits of the Three Realms’ City Deities and Earthly Spirits (Sānjiè Chénghuáng Sìdiǎn Yìnggǎn Zhēnlíng)**,
The **Five Inner Court Deities (Nèitíng Wǔsì Zhīshén)**,
The **Incense-Officials and Messengers of the Great Offering (Jiàojiào Xiāngguān Shǐzhě)**,
And the **True Inspectors of the Mysterious Void’s Descending Rectification (Xuánxū Xiàjiàng Jiǔchá Zhēnshǐ)**.

With deepest reverence, we await Your **Boundless Mercy (Hóngcí)**,
And Your **Piercing Discernment (Diūjiàn)**.

Your humble servant, in profound submission, acknowledges:
That the **Dao encompassing Heaven and Earth (Fànwéi Tiāndì Dàodé)**
Is achieved through the **Three Qi (Sānqì)**, by which the **Primordial Essence (Húnníng)** is perfected.

The **Illuminating Chapter of the Clouded Han** unfolds from the Five Classics.
The **Supreme Yang** blazes forth, its **Boundless Virtue** profound and mysterious.

Its **Mysteries** transcend speech and thought,
Its **Manifest Power** partakes in the **Cosmic Transformation** of night.

Beholding the **origin of the Ritual of Abstinence and Offerings (Zhāojiào)**,
We first establish the **Great Offering (Jiào)**—
May our **sincere invocation** turn the **Heavenly Response (Huìtiān)**,
And may we **align with the auspicious and reverent** to **divine the day (Bùrì)**.

Illuminating service to the **Supreme Deity (Shàngdì)**,
The **Pine and Flower Assembly (Sōnghuā Huì)** truly convenes;
Embracing the **Hundred Spirits (Bǎishén)** with **gentle conciliation (Huáiróu)**,
The **Sincere Devotion (Yùnzǎo)** may be **proffered as tribute (Jiàn)**.

The **Piercing Discernment** knows no obstruction,
The **Graceful Bestowal** leaves nothing unshared.

Now, Your humble servants, in **reverent submission (Qíánqíjìng)**,
Await Your **Edict (Zhìmìng)** with **pious prayer (Qíjìng)**.
We **solicit the Mysterious Sovereign’s (Xuánzhǔ)** swift guidance.

The **auspicious incense vapors** disperse in **rainbow hues (Sǎncǎi)**,
The **luminous candle shadows** intermingle in **divine radiance (Jiāohuī)**.
**Mandarin ducks and cranes** advance in **harmonious ranks (Fēnxì yuānxíng)**,
**Serene and orderly**, dividing their **ceremonial stations (Fēnbān)** on either side;

**Dragon banners and phoenix chariots** appear in **visionary splendor (Lóngqí luányú)**,
**Imagined in the celestial procession (Xiǎngjià)** floating through the void.
We **don the luminous robes**, gazing upward at the **two celestial lights (Liǎngyào)**,
And **align the cosmic threads**, revering the **clustered stars (Zhòngxīng)** in their **supporting arc (gǒng)**.

The **dim and bright** are **fully revealed (Yōumíng dōngqǐ)**,
The **Earthly Spirits** surge beside the **Jade Formation (Yùjú)**;
The **vast and boundless** depths **cleanse and brighten (Hàomiǎo hóngchéng)**,
The **Water Emperor** emerges from the **Pearl Palace (Zhūgōng)** beyond.

**Golden Tortoises** command the **misty ranks (Jīnniú cèwù)**,
**Farewell to the Three Isles’ (Sāndǎo)** **Celestial Homeland (Xiānxiāng)**;
**Iron-Hoofed Steeds** neigh in the **wind (Tiěmǎ sīfēng)**,
**Nearly attending** at the **Ninefold Incense Altar (Jiǔchóng xiāng’àn)**.

The **Multitudes of True Ones** gather in **cosmic array (Zhòngzhēn jiāohuì, Wànxiàng sēnluó)**,
We **behold the solemn and majestic (Zhānmùmù huánghuáng)**,
And **pay homage with reverent awe (Jìng yōngyōng sùsù)**.

Descending to the **Ritual Assembly (Fǎxí)**,
Your **Graceful Inspection (Huìjiàn)** witnesses our **sincere devotion (Jīngchéng)**.

Your humble servants, along with the **Ritual Officials (Lǐguān)** and **Lawful Assembly (Fǎzhòng)**,
**Solemnly kowtow twice (Jǐn qǐshǒu)**,
**Gazing afar** at the **Heavenly Steps (Tiānjiē)**,
**Devoutly welcoming** the **Sacred Procession (Shèngyú)**.

**The Seven Celestial Rulers descend (Jiàng)**,
**Phoenix Chariots arrive (Luányú zhǐzhǐ)**,
**Crane-Drawn Chariots** **hover at the veranda (Hèjià línchuán)**.
With the **Assembled True Ones of the Great Offering (Jiàozhòng zhēnzhēn)**,
We **conduct the rites as prescribed (Rúyí cháolí)**.

The **ceremonial rites are fully completed (Cháolí jìzhōu)**,
Each **ascends to their respective platform (Zéng shēngtánzuò)**.
Your humble servants, along with the **Ritual Officials (Lǐguān)**,
**Kowtow twice and offer incense (Zàibài shàngxiāng)**,
**Reverently performing the First Tribute (Qíngxíng chūxiàn)**.

**First Tribute Rites (Chūxiàn Fǎshì)**
**Repeatedly proclaim the Lawful Rank (Chóngchēng fǎwèi)**.

**With the Assembled Officials and True Ones (Jùwèi chén xìngmǒu yǔ lín tán guānzhòng děng),**

We **solemnly and devoutly kowtow twice** and **offer incense in supplication (qǐngxiāng shàngqǐ)** to the **Formless Void of Nature’s Dao (Xūwú zìrán)**, the **Three Sovereigns of the Three Realms (Sānqīng sānjièng tiānzūn)**, the **Most Venerable of the Golden Gate (Jīnquè zhìzūn)**, and the **Three August Emperors of Heavenly Authority (Sānhuáng tiāndì)**.
We **honor the Earthly Sovereign (Hòutǔ huángdì zhǐ)** who **receives Heaven’s mandate and follows its laws (Chéngtiān xiàofǎ)**.
To the **Assemblies of All Heavens, All Earths, All Waters, and All Mountains (Zhūtiān zhūdì zhūshuǐ zhūshān)**,
To the **Three Realms and Ten Directions (Sānjiè shí fāng)**, the **Thousands of True Ones and Ten Thousands of Saints (Qiānzhēn wànshèng)**,
We **prayerfully invite all to descend in response (Jiàozhòng gǎnjiàng yīqiè wēilíng)**.

**Reverently gazing upon the boundless mercy (Gōngwàng hóngcí)**,
**Humbly awaiting the all-pervading insight (Fǔchuí dòngjiàn)**.
Your humble servants **prostrate themselves**, for **wishes granted must be sincere (Yǒuyuàn bì cóng)**,
And **the unspoken will align with the resonant Dao (Yìngmò tóng yú yǐngxiǎng)**;
**Virtue unanswered cannot be (Wúdé bù bào)**,
Yet **devout sincerity alone suffices (Jìngshí zài yú jīngchéng)**.

We **solemnly reflect upon the august dignity of the Supreme Dao (Wǎngwěi huángjí zhī zūnróng)**,
And **reverently follow the precepts of the True Teachers (Gōngàn shīzhēn zhī jiàodiǎn)**.
With **fasting and ritual purity (Zhāixiū jīnluán)**,
We **conduct the rites with utmost solemnity (Yíjìng zhǎn yú cháoxiū)**;
Our **sincerity reaches even the Phoenix Chariots (Qínggé luányú)**,
And **our completed rites are presented in gratitude (Lǐbì chén yú jiàoxiè)**.

**Truth admits no duality, nor do rites differ in significance (Lǐ wú yǒu èr, shì qǐ huìshū)**.
We **seek only that blessings may not falter (Wéi qiú fú zhī bù huí)**,
For **all are moved by devout sincerity (Jiē zhìchéng zhī suǒ gǎn)**.

**The Dao is vast above, and its mysteries profound within (Yángyáng zài shàng, dòngdòng hū zhōng)**.
We **present the Green Petition (Shèjiào qīngcí)**,
And **diligently recite the sacred words (Jǐn dāng xuānzòu)**.

**Recitation of the Sacred Words (Xuāncí)**
**Reverently following the edict’s intent (Gōngchéng cízhǐ, bèijí jīngchéng)**,
With **one earnest thought (Wéi yīniàn zhī kuǎnqí)**,
We **hope for silent response (Shùjī mògǎn)**;
In **many rites performed (Zài duōcí zhī kèxiǎng)**,
We **dare to offer the sacred sacrifice (Gǎn jiàn mínggǎn)**.

**The august presence of Heavenly Authority descends (Huánghuáng tiāndì zhī lín)**,
And **the assembly of all spirits trembles in awe (Zhuójù bǎilíng zhī huì)**.
With **our offerings and libations placed (Jūxīn xiàndiàn)**,
We **gather auspicious omens in abundance (Shìjí zhēnxiáng)**.

**Plenitude of wisdom and sagacity (Cōngmíng ruìzhī)**,
Is **sufficient to manifest their presence (Zúyǐ yǒulín)**;
**Their commands and decrees (Hàolìng wénzhāng)**,
Are **radiant and worthy of recounting (Huànhù kě shù)**.

**Governance without action (Wúwéi ér zhì)**,
Achieves **the refined wind of tranquility (Kèzhēn qīngjìng zhī fēng)**;
**All things flourish in spring (Yǒuwù jiē chūn)**,
And **eternal joy brings the age of great peace (Yǒnglè tàipíng zhī shì)**.

**The Heavenly Plan is vast and boundless (Huángtú guǎngdà)**,
And **the Sacred Calculations stretch without end (Shèngsuàn miáncháng)**.
Your humble servants, along with the **Ritual Officials (Lǐguān)**,
**Kowtow twice and offer incense (Zàibài shàngxiāng)**,
**Reverently performing the Second Tribute (Gōngxíng yàxiàn)**.

**Second Tribute Rites (Yàxiàn Fǎshì)**
Your humble servants **solemnly and devoutly kowtow twice** and **offer incense in supplication (Shàngqǐ)** to the **Formless Void (Xūwú)** of the **Three Sovereigns (Sānqīng)**, the **Supreme Saints of Mysterious Existence (Shàngshèng miàoyǒu shíjí gāozhēn)**,
To the **Ten Thousands of Spirits and Ten Thousands of Saints (Wànlíng shíshèng)** in the **Three Realms and Ten Directions (Sānjiè shífāng)**,
We **prayerfully invite all to descend in response (Jiàozhòng gǎnjiàng yīqiè zhēnlíng)**.

**Reverently gazing upon the boundless mercy (Gōngwàng hóngcí)**,
**Humbly awaiting the all-pervading insight (Fǔchuí dòngjiàn)**.
Your humble servants **prostrate themselves**, for **Heavenly Authority descends without hesitation (Wéi yǒulín wú èr)**;
**The spirits reside in reverence (Shìzhēn jūxīn)**,
And **we honor the gods as though they were present (Tǐwù ér bùkě yí)**.

We **humbly submit our red sincerity (Wéi fǔ yǒng yú dānxūn)**,
And **loftily respond to boundless grace (Yòng yǎngdá yú hóng’ēn)**.
Our **earnest devotion is unceasing (Shǒuchén zhī zhì quánquán)**,
And **our repentance is unwavering (Guīyǐ zhī chéng yìyì)**.

We **humbly pray that the gods may accept our sincerity (Fúyuàn shénxiǎng yú chéng)**,
And **grant celestial blessings (Tiān zuò zhī fú)**.
May **grace flow eternally to our kin and realm (Liú’ēn jiāguó)**,
And **auspicious merit be perpetually extolled (Yáng yáng bùxī zhī jī)**;
May **blessings gather at our ancestral shrine (Liǎnfú zōngfān)**,
And **fulfill our pious entreaties (Shìfù qiánqí zhī qǐng)**.

**All requests are answered, and no devout appeal goes unfulfilled (Yǒuqiú jiē yìng, wúgǎn bù tōng)**.
Your humble servants **pay utmost reverence (Zhìgōng)**,
And **complete the rites with the Final Tribute (Lǐshēn zhōngxiàn)**.

**Final Tribute Rites (Zhōngxiàn Fǎshì)**
**Recite the Sacred Petition (Xuānzhàng)**.

Your humble servant, with utmost sincerity and reverence, **prostrates before the Three Pure Ones and Supreme Deities, the Ten Directions’ Highest Worthies, the Mysterious Vault of Heaven’s Imperial Seat, the Starry Worthies of the Profound Earth, and the Cavernous Heavens and Oceanic Mountains**, where the **sacrificial rites have evoked the descent of all august and numinous spirits**.

With **solemn devotion**, your servant **humbles beneath the celestial mandate**, daring to **behold the divine chariot’s ascent**; with **ritual propriety fulfilled**, how dare we **linger beneath the gusting winds of the sacred vehicle**?

The **radiant candles flicker to embers**, the **spiraling incense smolders to ash**.
The **golden chimes fall silent**, the **jade water-clock’s tolls hasten**.

**Riding the pure qi and commanding yin-yang**, we **watch the dragon carriage ascend**;
**Beneath the august Heaven and upon the profound Earth**, we **rely on the boundless benevolence of the Sovereign’s embrace**.

Your servant, together with the **ritual officials and the assembled Daoist assembly**, is **utterly overwhelmed by gratitude, indebtedness, and the weight of received virtue**.

With **deepest reverence**, we **prostrate and bow twice**, and **offer our words to the Sacred Procession**.

**Hymn of Farewell to the Sacred**
To the **Spirit-Guardians who tend the incense, the Incense-Officers, the Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords, and the Attendant Spirits of the Incense**, may it be decreed that **wherever your servant has established the rites, golden elixirs and jade-green herbs shall spontaneously arise**.

May the **hundred spirits and worthies gather here**, their **qi converging at the incense altar and furnace before us**.
May the **ten-directional celestial youths and jade maidens attend in attendance**, and **through the fragrant mists convey your servant’s sincerity as previously offered, swiftly reaching the Supreme Dao of the Limitless, the Three Pure Ones, the Most High Sovereign of the Golden Gate, the Jade Emperor, Supreme Deity of Heaven, before the Celestial Court**.

**The golden talisman rites are now complete**.
